name: Vegan Baked Mac and Cheese
description: The Ultimate Vegan Baked Mac and Cheese, a family favorite and easy to make! Creamy, cheesy and topped with a buttery panko breadcrumb topping.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease a large casserole dish (I used a 9 x 13 inch dish).
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease a large casserole dish (I used a 9 x 13 inch dish).

recipeInstructions.text: Soak cashews: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak cashews: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the cheese sauce: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a blender along with 2 cups of fresh water, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, garlic clove, onion powder and salt. Blend until very smooth, and set aside. It will appear a bit watery, but that is right as it thickens while it bakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the cheese sauce: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a blender along with 2 cups of fresh water, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, garlic clove, onion powder and salt. Blend until very smooth, and set aside. It will appear a bit watery, but that is right as it thickens while it bakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to package instructions, but one minute less. The noodles will continue to cook in the oven, so do not overcook. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to package instructions, but one minute less. The noodles will continue to cook in the oven, so do not overcook. Drain and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the breadcrumb topping: In a small bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs, melted vegan butter and paprika.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the breadcrumb topping: In a small bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs, melted vegan butter and paprika.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the drained pasta to the casserole dish. Pour the cheese sauce on top of the noodles and stir to combine. Sprinkle the breadcrumb mixture on top and bake, uncovered, for about 15-20 minutes until warm and golden brown.
